Title: Sentiment-Analysis-of-Demonetization-Tweets
Description: Analyze the users Sentiment especially I focused on Tweets Polarity whether a tweet is positive, negative and it is zero(felling) by given numerical value to the words.

Title: Population Forecast
Description: Analyze the Indian population data and predict the growth rate and also the future population of India up to 2050. and build a dashboard to show the analysis and Prediction.

Title: Covid-19 Data Visualisation Dashboard
Description: This Coronavirus dashboard provides an overview of the 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) epidemic. This dashboard is built with R using the Rmakrdown framework.
